name: whimsical
title: Whimsical
description: Transform ideas into beautiful diagrams using AI. Automatically generates flowcharts, mindmaps, and sequence diagrams from natural language descriptions.
author: kud

commands.name: info
commands.title: About Whimsical AI Tools
commands.description: Learn about the available AI diagram tools

tools.name: diagram
tools.title: Whimsical Diagram
tools.description: Generate flowcharts, mindmaps, or sequence diagrams using AI. Just describe what you want and the AI will choose the best diagram type and create it for you.

evals.input: @whimsical create a flowchart for a user login process with email and password validation

content.text:
âœ¨ **Flowchart Generated**

A flowchart showing the user authentication process with login validation steps.

ðŸ”— **Diagram URL:** https://whimsical.com/example-login-flowchart

## Mermaid preview

```mermaid
flowchart TD
  Start --> Login
  Login --> Validate
  Validate --> Success
```

evals.input: @whimsical generate a mindmap about project planning with branches for timeline, resources, and deliverables

content.text:
âœ¨ **Mindmap Generated**

A mindmap outlining project planning with timeline, resources, and deliverables.

ðŸ”— **Diagram URL:** https://whimsical.com/example-project-mindmap

## Mermaid preview

```mermaid
mindmap
  root
    Project Planning
      Timeline
      Resources
      Deliverables
```

evals.input: @whimsical make a sequence diagram showing the interaction between a client, server, and database for an API request

content.text:
âœ¨ **Sequence Diagram Generated**

A sequence diagram illustrating the API interaction flow for client-server-database communication.

ðŸ”— **Diagram URL:** https://whimsical.com/example-api-sequence

## Mermaid preview

```mermaid
sequenceDiagram
  Client->>Server: API Request
  Server->>Database: Query
  Database->>Server: Result
  Server->>Client: Response
```

evals.input: @whimsical design a flowchart for an e-commerce checkout process including cart review, payment, and order confirmation

content.text:
âœ¨ **Flowchart Generated**

A flowchart detailing the e-commerce checkout process from cart to confirmation.

ðŸ”— **Diagram URL:** https://whimsical.com/example-checkout-flowchart

## Mermaid preview

```mermaid
flowchart TD
  Cart --> Payment
  Payment --> Confirmation
```

evals.input: @whimsical create a mindmap for learning Python programming with main topics and subtopics

content.text:
âœ¨ **Mindmap Generated**

A mindmap for learning Python programming with core concepts and topics.


scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
